subject: URGENT: Re-validation shows 3 endpoints FAILING - Not 1!
body:
Team,

I just re-ran validation on ALL 5 GETs. Results are worse than reported:

## Current Status (Same MongoDB = Must be EXACT)

| Endpoint | Express | AF TEST | Status |
|----------|---------|---------|--------|
| Categories | 10 | 10 | ✅ EXACT |
| Roles | 5 | 5 | ✅ EXACT |
| Organizers | 49 | 47 | ❌ -2 BUG |
| Venues | 64 | 66 | ❌ +2 BUG |
| Events | 384 | 394 | ❌ +10 BUG |

**Only 2 of 5 GETs are passing!**

Possible causes:
- Organizers: AF missing 2 records - filter difference?
- Venues: AF returning 2 extra records - isArchived filter?
- Events: Date filter logic difference

Fulton - Need to investigate all 3. Same DB = code differences.

Ben - Can you confirm Express filter logic for Organizers and Venues?

- Sarah
